title: Once every 20 games league just wont let me connect to the game
body: Its so frustrating when once every 20 games league just wont let me connect to the game and i get a leave, lose lp, and now i have low priority queue. Im trying to get plat before the season ends and this puts me on tilt so hard when this happens

replies.body: What error message do you get when this happens? Most of the time, issues connecting to games are linked to a poor connection to our servers, but I figured I'd ask in case it was something like a bugsplat crash or something similar.
After champ select my league just doesnt open occasionally, it hasnt happened since i posted this tho which is nice. Thank you for the response sorry i didnt notice it until now.
